DOC.brief_summary: To compare the effectiveness of acupuncture and transcutaneous electrical nervous stimulation (TENS) in reducing patient's discomfort during colonoscopy
DOC.brief_title: Electroacupuncture and Trancutaneous Electrical Nervous Stimulation (TENS) for Colonoscopy Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation patient's pain and discomfort during colonoscopy, using two non invasive analgesic methods.
DOC.criteria: all patients scheduled for colonoscopy and in whom deep sedation was not planned will be included in the study age > 80 and less than 18 years old, severe cardiac or pulmonary disease, anticoagulant, benzodiazepines, antidepressants, opiates therapies, severe cognitive impairment, uncontrolled hypertension.
